title: sales director, country manager
skills: Dynamic, strong, result-oriented, sales-driven, analytical thinking, strategic approach

experience.description:

•	Key customers relationships establishing (Leroy Merlin, Castorama, OBI, K-Rauta, (Hoff), Maxidom, Baucenter, etc.)

•	Creation of sustainable logistic schemes for uninterrupted supply of goods
•	Team motivation and management (25 people)
•	Special Russian assortment developing
•	Full responsibility for business plan achievements

•	Start –up project in Ukraine via distributor model
•	Strategic and operational management of the company
•	Development planning, preparation of business plan and budget as part of the strategy of the company.

•	Management of structural areas : sales; procurement, logistics, warehousing, Finance, and accounting; marketing, IT, merchandising, customer service. Organization of work and effective cooperation between all departments.
•	Pricing. Management accounting. Statements in accordance with GAAP. The passage of the annual audit (without comment). Preparation of monthly reporting to the shareholders of the company.

•	Assortment policy developing. 2000 SKU
•	Distribution management, distribution channels (DIY, Internet , specialty stores light, architects and designers).
•	Establishing of relationships with strategic customers: international, Federal DIY networks (Leroy Merlin, Castorama, OBI, K-Rauta, (Hoff), Maxidom, Baucenter, etc.), distributors, design organizations (b2b).

•	Retail sales organization DIY format (OBI, Leroy Merlin, Castorama и т.д.)
•	Sales planning and performance control
•	Key customers negotiations
•	Product management
• Sales strategy creation;
• People managment (22 people)

experience.position: Segment leader Corian, Montelli, Zodiaq Russia &Belarus (B2B)
experience.description:
Sales organanization in B2B busines in furniture production and construction within Direct sales model and distibution model.
Key projects leading, key customers relationship. Push and pull strategy. Sales and marketing planing. Budgeting.
People management – 7 sales and technical representatives, 3 promoters, customer service team ( 8 people).

Market analysis, analysis of competitive, distributors networking, negotiations, stock planning, sales of b2b concept, maintaining and developing key customers relationships, short and middle term sales planning, budgeting, branding, new brand launching
Economic activity analysis, financial analysis, GAAP and Russian standard Accounting, SAP implementation.
Project management, marketing research, production planning, sales planning, budgeting, financial analysis
